full_description:
Mobvoi TicWatch GTH Fitness Tracker Smartwatch

The Mobvoi TicWatch GTH is a health expert on your wrist. It has a brilliant 1.55" high-resolution full touch color display. The TicWatch GTH comes with powerful sensors to help you reach optimal health. It continuously monitors your skin temperature, blood oxygen (SpO2) levels, heart rate, respiration rate, and even your sleep quality. Your respiration rate is the number of breaths that you take per minute. By monitoring this it can help detect early changes in your health. This advanced fitness tracking smartwatch also helps you keep track of your progress and show all that youâ€™ve accomplished. Swim, bike, and run all week long with up to 10 days of battery. The TicWatch GTH comes with a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
Mobvoi TicWatch E3 Android Wear OS Smartwatch

The Mobvoi TicWatch E3 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon Wear 4100 Platform and Mobvoi dual-processor system. It offers smooth performance and advanced health sensors in a classic, stylish design. It comes with a 1.3" High Density (360 x 360 px) 2.5D curved display. The premium polycarbonate frame allows for a durable and ultra-lightweight design at only 32g. The Mobvoi TicWatch E3 Smartwatch is equipped with WearOS by Google. It includes Google Pay, Assistant, Maps, and so much more.

All-day heart rate & SpO2 monitoring

It comes with an advanced heart rate sensor that monitors heart rate accurately in real-time when you are active and at rest. The blood oxygen sensor in the TicWatch E3 consists of four sets of infrared LED light clusters and measures your SpO2 level by shining light into the blood vessels of your wrist. With TicWatch E3 you can choose to give permission and share your health and fitness data with a loved one to help achieve your health goals together. TicWatch E3 tracks your light, deep and REM sleep while providing significant insights to help you build better sleep habits. With the built-in GPS, GLONASS and Beidou positioning, so you can see your path, discover new trails, and enjoy outdoor activity with safety and confidence.

Contactless payment with Google Pay

The Mobvoi TicWatch E3 Smartwatch supports Google Pay. Keep your card in your wallet, and use contactless payments with Google Pay right from your TicWatch E3. Just tap and go, wherever tap payments are accepted.

The Mobvoi TicWatch E3 comes with a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Android Wear OS Smartwatch

The Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Smartwatch comes with a 1.4" 454x454 326ppi Full Color Always On Display AMOLED + FSTN Display. It is protected by a Corning Gorilla Glass. The 1.4" large display features damage-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass, which delivers enhanced sunlight readability, and outstanding resistance to scratches, bumps, and drops from everyday use. The Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Smartwatch is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon Wear 4100 + Dual System Platform. It has 1GB of RAM and 8GB ROM. This 810G Military Standard Smart Watch is featured with Wear OS by Google. It offers countless features for your day-to-day life. The TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS is built to enable a fast, smooth experience.

Qualcomm Snapdragon 4100 platform and Mobvoi dual-processor system

The Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Smartwatch features a Qualcomm Snapdragon Wear 4100 Platform and Mobvoi dual-processor system that combines cutting-edge technologies and support for a dual-display system.

Dual Display 2.0 technology with customized colorful backlight

The Dual Display 2.0 technology of the Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Smartwatch layers a low power screen on top of a brilliant AMOLED display, powering your adventures with up to 72 hours of battery life in Smart Mode and up to 45 days in Essential mode. The backlight color palette offers 18 different colors to make the screen comfortable to read under any conditions, especially in the dark.

All five global satellite systems: GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS, and Beidou

The TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS has access to all five global satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS, and Beidou) to help you plan your perfect adventure, track routes, and guide you to your destination anywhere in the world. The built-in barometer provides constant altitude information by measuring ambient air pressure to calculate altitude and altitude changes (in outdoor workout mode).

24HR continuous heart rate tracking & SPO2 monitoring

The Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Smartwatch has an advanced heart rate sensor that monitors heart rate accurately in real-time when you are active and at rest. The TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS uses light beams to measure the oxygen level of your blood, providing you with insights into how well your body is absorbing oxygen and helping you understand your overall health.

Contactless payments with Google Pay

The Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Smartwatch supports Google Pay and makes contactless payments with Google Pay right from your card in your wallet. Just tap to pay and go, wherever contactless payments are accepted.

The Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra GPS Smartwatch comes with a 1-year warranty.
